Two-year-old girl from Brazil sees her mother for the first time thanks to surgery

article_metadata.news-keywords: Navigator, Grant, CMS, Centers, Medicaid, Medicare, Training
article_metadata.description: North Carolina will receive a boost in federal funding this year to train and recruit “navigators” as the Affordable Care Act enters its third year and penalties surge for those who fail to enroll.
article_metadata.title: NC gets $3.6M to train ACA navigators | News & Observer
